summary: Berta, a naive young maid, searches for love when the army engineers come to town to build a bridge.
cast: Hanna Schygulla|Harry Baer|Irm Hermann|Rudolf Waldemar Brem|Walter Sedlmayr|Klaus Löwitsch|Carla Egerer|Günther Kaufmann|Burghard Schlicht|Elga Sorbas|Gunter Krää|Ulli Lommel
title: Pioniere in Ingolstadt
